summary: Equipment management app; add equipment search (enhanced search options) and automatic equipment number generation.

existing_features.title: Update the Equipment Master (create equipment) UI to clearly indicate that the equipment number is generated automatically and show the next number to the user.
Add an equipment search capability on the Equipment List page with expanded search options across multiple fields.
Improve equipment selection UX wherever the EquipmentLookup dropdown is used by adding a basic search/filter for equipment options.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add search functionality for equipment list/module
Expose the next auto-generated equipment number from the backend so the frontend can display it before equipment creation.

projectName: Automatic equipment number generation and enhanced equipment search
